#include<iostream>
//#define gc1() getchar_unlocked()
#define gc1() getchar()
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
inline int fastread()
{
int i=0;
char c=gc1();
while(c<48) c=gc1();
while(c>47)
{
i=i*10+c-48;
c=gc1();
}
return i;
}
int main()
{
    int t,flag;
    int n,m,i,j,s,k,x,pos,l,tmp;
    t=fastread();
    while(t--)
    {
        n=fastread();
        s=n;
        int max=0,count,pos;
        int a[n],b[n],d[n];

        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            a[i]=fastread();
            b[i]=fastread();
            //d[i]=0;
        }
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            max=b[i];
            pos=i;
            for(j=i;j<n;j++)
            {
               if(max==b[j])
               {
                   if(a[pos]>a[j])
                   {
                       max=b[j];
                       pos=j;
                   }
               }
               else if(b[j]<max)
               {
                   max=b[j];pos=j;
               }
            }
            tmp=b[pos];
            b[pos]=b[i];
            b[i]=tmp;
            tmp=a[pos];
            a[pos]=a[i];
            a[i]=tmp;

        }
        for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            count=0;
            if(a[i]==-1) continue;
            //if(d[i]>=0)
            else
            {
                for(j=i+1;j<n;j++)
                {
                    if(a[j]==-1)continue;
                    //if((a[j]>=a[i]&&a[j]<=b[i])||(a[j]<=a[i]&&b[j]>=b[i]))
                    if(a[j]<=b[i]&&b[j]>=a[i])
                    {
                        count++;
                        a[j]=-1;
                    }
                }
                s-=count;
            }
        }



        printf("%d\n",s);
    }
    return 0;
}
